title: Japan vs South Africa - Rugby World Cup 2019 quarter-final: Makazole Mapimpi double ends hosts’ dreams in Tokyo
text:
Makazole Mapimpi’s double helped South Africa end Japan’s Rugby World Cup dreams with an emphatic 26-3 victory to advance to the semi-finals.

The Springboks will now meet Wales in a tasty clash for a place in the final after a fast start denied the hosts gaining any momentum in an electric Tokyo atmosphere.

Mapimpi’s fourth-minute try built the lead and Handre Pollard’s boot only stretched it further until Japan’s resistance was broken late on.
